tweet: Given hotter-than-expected June CPI inflation, S&P 500’s real earnings yield has dropped to -2.1%, its lowest since 1974 (if it falls further, it may reach lowest on record)

Earnings lift: remains to be seen, but if S&P 500 EPS hit Wall Street strategists’ average target of $183 by end of this year, even if market closed at its current level (which would be 10.8% gain), T12M P/E would come down from current 29.9 to 22.8

Courtesy of our friends at  two sets of analysis on what could happen to S&P 500 earnings if corp tax rate is raised to 28% (left) or 25% (right) … in total, hit could range anywhere from 2.5-13%

U.S house prices rose 11.2% y/y in January, fastest pace since 2006 … S&P CoreLogic Case-Shiller Index continued to surge into new year given low rates, but cooling might be in store given some affordability issues & supply constraints

Hunt for yield may be back on; so far this month, dividend-based strategies have been leading charge among U.S. factors, with 4.8% indicated yield on S&P 500 Low Volatility High Dividend Index tempting some to look beyond wobbling bond markets for income

Analysts increased profit forecasts at light speed last year, but enthusiasm may be rolling over … proportion of net upgrades to total changes in earnings estimates reached high of 42.6% last month but has dipped to 39.2%

Looking at valuation from perspective of % of S&P 500 valuation that can’t be explained by book value or earnings expectations over next 3 years—shows “hopes & dreams” of market ... now highest since dot-com era as per

Market’s roller coaster may continue: VIX hovering near 30, a level that—on average since VIX began publication in 1990–has historically been followed by average daily movement of 1.3% in S&P 500 (VIX futures curve points to continued election-related volatility)

Stocks with volatility in top 10th %tile have mostly been been in Tech sector & have massive market caps (left); 5 largest in S&P 500 continued to rise with surge in call buying that started in July ...  notes risk overhang may not take too long to unwind
